name: Semper Paratus
text: Fairhope sweet shop is an adorable little shop in a quaint little town on the Eastern shore of Alabama that one must visit if you happen to be exploring the area. They offer classic candy as well as New and exciting treats that is sure to satisfy just about any craving. Be sure to try their delicious Frios Ice pops too! They will cool you down from the Hot Alabama heat!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: Deanna
text: My favorite sweet shop around!!! They have all the fun cute candies, even the ones you may be searching for. Cute environment/ set up. Family friendly and very nice worker. My experience there is always positive. Good pricing and selection. Definitely worth more than a five star review. ☺️❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!

name: Barbara Williams
text: Great little candy shop with all the familiar candies we have learned to love.  When i visited the store while we were in Fairhope, I did not feel like we were welcome in the store, but the clerk could have been having a bad day.

resp.text: Barbara, I’m so sorry that you felt unwelcome while visiting our shop. I will make sure I address the issue with our employees to make sure we correct this problem. Thank you for your feedback, we are always wanting to change for the better and feedback will help us do that. Hope you visit again soon.

name: Kara Morgan
text: Fairhope Sweet Shop is a great place to take the kids or yourself for a treat! They have all kinds of treats and candies. Cute little shop, I will definitely take my kids back next time we are in Fairhope.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review, we are so happy you enjoy our shop!

name: Jason Temple
text: Cool little boutique shop

name: Chantle Uthe
text: Love all the different yummies from my childhood.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: jack jaquess
text: Such a cute little store! Loved the atmosphere and great candy

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review! We are so happy you enjoy our shop!

name: halle vines
text: Such an awesome place!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!

name: Tara Dixon
text:
Placed an order for anniversary and it was suppose to be delivered today April 16, 2021. When I called the store, worker said it was in transit. Arrangement never arrived.

I expect a full refund first thing in the morning. If they couldn’t provide the service why take my money and then lie like it’s in transit.

Adding insult to injury, Cory Lewis, if that’s even his name called the recipient to say that the delivery address was outside of their delivery zone. However, no one called this morning to say that was the case, and even when I called at 4:49 pm, the woman who answered did not state this, she said the delivery was in transit.

Then to put icing on the cake, Cory Lewis called me to say they tried to deliver the order but the man didn’t expect the order, there was no man at the address all day and someone was literally sitting home waiting on the order all day. Then he tried to add yet another lie to that.

Professionalism and truthfulness is not a big ask when doing business, this placed missed big. I expect a refund and a call from management.

name: Monica Bray-Grant
text: Placed an order on Wednesday for an arrangement to be delivered on Friday for my Mother In Law's birthday. Called Thursday afternoon to see about adding some additional instructions to her delivery. The rep informed me that they are not doing deliveries to Tuskegee that weekend but will deliver to that area next weekend? What kind of business are they running here? No one had even called me to let me know that it was not going to be delivered. Shabby business!

name: Beverly Butler
text: Fabulous and quick service! Order online even if you need delivery for a birthday the next day. I was able to order and have this wonderful gift delivered even though I couldn't be there to celebrate the event. I hope your experience goes as well as mine!

name: Shay G
text: I am 32 weeks pregnant an had a craving for their chocolate covered strawberries. The cashier was extremely rude as I was ordering my 6 strawberries. It had just turned 2pm an she said it would take 20-30 minutes and as I’m looking at the smoothies she tells me we close at 3pm and i don’t have any fruit chopped for smoothies (rolls her eyes and gasps for air). I honestly didn’t appreciate her whole attitude and decided not to even purchase here.

name: Takeya Wilkins
text: I called in to place an order over the phone. My call was answered quickly and professionally. I was not sure what exactly I wanted but the representative gave me multiple options based on the information I provided of who I was sending it to. The call took less than 10 minutes to get me taken care of. I appreciated the expedient service! My mom LOVED her arrangement. The fruit was fresh and actually looked like the photo! I will be ordering again from this store!

name: Michelle
text: Thank you NIKKI for your amazing customer service!! Very well spoken and catered to my edible arrangement needs!!

name: Monique Holland
text: I have used this company multiple times and have found them to be courteous and very professional. All of the deliveries arrived on time and my guests devoured the fruit trays (especially chocolate covered strawberries) before any of the other items!! They create amazing arrangements that I have even used as centerpieces.

name: Kelroderick Pittman
text: Nice friendly staff. They greeted me as soon as ai walked through the door. I wpuld highly recommend this place to everyone.

name: IMF
text: I ordered super late on V-day and they still delivered in a timely manner to recipient!! I was hesitant at first b/c of the reviews but, to give them a chance. I'm glad I took a gamble. The recipient enjoyed their arrangement and raved at how fresh and delicious the fruit was!! Thanks guys!!

name: Marroni Blue
text: I must say my husband ordered several boxes from this location and each time they never failed on quality.  Excellent politeness from the clerk but when I asked for a bag she stated she didn't have any.  Great products! !!

name: Lisa Burnham
text: Orderes 6 carmel apples.  Tried pieces from two of them the apples where mushy.

name: Justin Stewart
text: Poor phone customer service and they do not deliver. Selection is also very slim. Not living up to the Edible Arrangement stores I have used in the past.

name: Pooka Jay
text: I love the Opelika location great arrangements and nice staff

name: Sarah Davis
text: If I could give this place less than one star I would. Courtney (the owner) is a consistent liar. He makes promise after promise when confronted and never delivers. If this place stays open for the next 6 months I will be SHOCKED with poor management like that.

name: Tamara Williams
text: Excellent customer service.  Beautiful arrangement. I will definitely order from this store again.

name: Kent Whitaker
text:
Horrible experience. My wife and I are not in Auburn so we chose this company to deliver an arrangement for Valentines Day for my mother-in-law in Opelika. We ordered a higher dollar item other than the lower priced special. Specifically for the reason of having more fruit and less chocolate as we were hoping for something a bit healthier because of health issues. They charged our credit card for the higher priced item we ordered but delivered the lower price special with added chocolate and it was a smaller item. In addition to the wrong item - they did not deliver it on Valentines Day. We called several times and they acted nice at first and promised to deliver the item the next day. Late in the day mom called and said it was never delivered. We called back and it was being delivered late in the day - a day late - and it was the wrong item, not the higher priced one we paid for.

We called again and one of the employees admitted they went to the wrong house on Valentines day so somebody got the higher priced item. My wife called again to at least get a refund for the overcharged amount or to have the right item delivered. We were promised the right item would be delivered. The next day, no delivery.

At this point, several days after Valentines Day my wife gave up so I started calling, was promised a refund or a deliver of the right item. There was no refund or proper delivery. I was then promised at least a call back from the owner, then another promise, another promised call back. I never heard back.

My mother in law never received the correct item and and we never got the refund. We finally tried to cancel payment with credit card and to get a refund but they disputed it - said that the item was delivered. Did not mention that it was the wrong item, and that it was late, missing Valentines Day. I'm sorry that they delivered the item, possibly twice, to the wrong house, and then the wrong item to the right address. That's three deliveries, three trips, three items. However, those mistakes are not our fault. All I know is that my mother in law never received what was ordered.

I would not recommend this company to another person.

I would probably have written a different review if the owner would have called me back as promised by the several employees.

name: C. K.
text: Fresh and on time delivery. Good customer service. I highly recommend this business.

name: Kate Dorsey
text: Placed an order well in advance enough to have delivered on mother in laws birthday, followed the ‘track your order’ the entire day of said scheduled delivery, and it finally changed to “arranging your order now” around lunchtime, and never changed again after that. I called several times, contacted via the live chat and email on website, had an automated reply sent with my “case number” saying I’d be contacted by the store. Never was. 3 days later on Monday I finally got someone on the phone and all she said was “yeah i don’t even what happened with that order haha. Do you want me to send it today?” (Never even got an apology or any type of discount offer or even an explanation) 4 days after her birthday? ummm yeah, no thanks. Never again. WAY too overpriced for quality of product and customer service

name: billy chapman
text: Fantastic work and highly pleased with my wifes mothers day gift

name: Demitri Sargent
text: What a beautiful healthy way to brighten someone's day. I had a great experience. Fruit was super fresh and the customer service was awesome!  #ediblearrangements #fruitbouquet

name: Tramon Woodson
text: When i get there my order was ready on time and since its my first time I'm pleased with the product

name: Anna Bradham
text: Took them 30 mins over the phone to take my order! They won’t make it in this town very long if they don’t get it together. Sad, because I love sending this kind of thing!

name: Jelisa Sharde
text: They did not deliver the edible arrangement that my bf ordered for me even though he paid for deliver. When he asked them about it, they said they were too busy. They never gave him a courtesy call to let him know that they were not going to be able to deliver the order. From what I have read about other peoples review,  they do not deliver anyone's arrangements so what are they so busy doing? They should just close the Auburn store down because they give Edible Arrangements a BAD name!

name: B Morgan
text: Wonderful people, exceptional product! 😊

name: Emily Nolan
text: WORST customer service. I would stay far far away.  The owner, Courtney, talks out of both sides of his mouth.  He sends out inferior arrangements, then when you call to get it made right, he promises to do something and then won't follow thru.  When you call the main store, he actually LIES to them.  Stay FAR FAR away....

name: Michelle Bryant
text: Awful customer service. Very disappointed. The order was never delivered today (Valentine's Day), and I paid for delivery today. I, nor the recipient, recieved a phone call to let us know. I have tried calling the store numerous times today and my call was continuously forwarded to a recording. Terrible!!!

name: Tecoya Brown
text: Worst customer service EVER! Don't waste your time dealing with this store. I will not recommend it to anyone!

name: Saddie Bell
text: I ordered from them and optd for it to be delivered however they never delivered my order. Even thought i called the store mulitple times. They said they had my order and they were behind because of traffic. And yet i did not get my order. And they charged me. Now i have to was days to get my money back. I will never use this the store in auburn alabama again. I will never recommend them to anyone.

name: selena resendiz
text: order never got delivered awful customer service just an all around bad experience

name: Tina mcbride
text: Excellent fresh fruit bouquets

name: Mido Sala
text: Bad customer service. They forgot to deliver an order and when I called them, the guy told me I did not pay for that additional order and when I gave him the number of the order he was still not convinced until his colleague corrected him. Ridiculous !

name: Elizabeth McElroy
text:
Worst experience. Don’t open when they should- those hours on the website mean nothing!!

Update: made it right

name: nakiya philpot
text: STAY FAR AWAY !!! store owner is HORRIBLE

name: Mac Man
text: Good.

name: allante smith
text: Terrible customer experience

name: Danny Milligan
text: No issues here other than they did not have the type of trees we were looking for. They were very busy and it took a few minutes to get help but when we did they were very friendly and helpful. I may be checking back with him on some trees and will update accordingly.

name: Rachel Finner
text: It was a great day for a bike ride.  Beautiful flowers,  friendly people and service at trade days.  We will definitely be back soon.

name: Trae Otwell
text: Great local business with very friendly  staff.

name: Jami Powers
text: Great selection of local items.

name: Brittany Windham
text: The staff here is very friendly, love having a local shop that supports other local sellers and craftsman. Such a pleasure and always nice varieties of items for gifts also. Fresh produce and plants galore. 😍

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your business!

name: Derek Ried
text: Great place! I love to buy plants and soil there.

name: Lori Covington-Strouss
text: I always enjoy the garden market. !

name: Neisha Dorantes
text: We have been so happy to support this shop since they opened. The guy owner is very nice, the lady however is very rude and has a temper. She came up behind me yelling at my daughter and I, made me jump off the ground startling me. We were doing nothing deserving of this behavior. Did it make you feel good yelling at my autistic daughter?

resp.text: Ma'am, no one yelled at your daughter. We only requested that you and your daughter leave the bird's nest undisturbed (I even said "please"), because often a mother bird will not return to a nest which has been disturbed. We respect that we share our outdoor space with the local wildlife, and we just don't want the baby birds to die. We want everyone who visits our store to feel welcome, people and wildlife.

name: Mike Weathers
text: This is a cool place.what a variety of goods.everyone needs to stop n check it out

name: jason cobb
text: Great people to  shop with

name: Rebecca Macks
text: awesome place, very clean and an amazing collection of interesting food items

name: Angela Boackle
text: My favorite place to shop

name: justin martnez
text:
(Translated by Google) Many pretty plants

(Original)
Muchas plantas bonitas

name: Michal Massey
text: 2 stars because the strawberries were good. What wasn’t were the flowers received. They were more dead than alive when picked up. Picked up from the store. They are already over  priced and then to look like this, never again. I will not be back for strawberries or flowers after this. Pictures will be added.

name: Tariq
text: My order couldn't be completed in the manner I ordered it, and it also couldn't be delivered either. All that considered, these guys are outstanding at heart. I got some seriously bad news while standing in the store, and the employee went out of his way to make sure that I received no more negativity while in that establishment. The order was emaculent.

name: TDB
text: Sad and pitiful. I'm embarrassed that these were delivered to a friend from me. Nothing like the pictures online. I visited the store to complain and she saw nothing wrong with them; however,  I did receive a refund.

name: Diana SSuarez
text: Terrible customer service. There was a delivery that should have been made on February 14, 2021. The delivery was never made. No one has called about the delay. I have tried to call multiple times and no one answers. When I check online for the status of the order it says that they are "preparing it". I am really baffled by the lack of communication and professionalism from this store.

name: Henry McElreath
text: I use the website to order.  It is easy and quick. There is a huge selection of fruits and candies.  They deliver when they say they will and my friends are always happy with their baskets.

name: Andrew Phelps
text: Do not rely on their delivery. I ordered for my wife's birthday to be delivered to her workplace. It finally just made it... as they've packed up for the day. Silly me, i thought ordering a week in advance would be enough time for them to figure out how to deliver to a business

resp.text: Andrew, we apologize. Our mission is to always deliver the best possible customer service experience and we’re so sorry we fell short. We want to make this right. Please send us your order information at orderteam@edible.com.

name: Ruth Dailey
text: Placed an order to be delivered on Thursday and 3 days later had not arrived. Nobody answer the phone!

name: Allison
text: They were not even PLANNING to deliver my "SAME DAY DELIVERY" order until TWO DAYS LATER and did not even reach out to let me know. No phone call, no email, nothing. I even paid extra to have same day delivery. What the heck?? I had to call them to find out what was going on. Worst. Customer. Service. EVER. Will never order from here again. WOW.

name: S D
text: Horrible customer service, specifically on 23 Feb 21.  I’m on military orders in DC.  Ordered VDay gifts for my mom and daughter.  They failed to deliver my order for VDay, understandably due to weather.  Spoke to them twice patiently thru the week.  Was told they could deliver it on 21 Feb.  never happened.  Called today and was told “we’re working on orders and calls from yesterday, we can work yours tomorrow.”  I ordered before yesterday...I called before yesterday.  Finally just requested a refund and the girl said done and hung up on me.  She failed to refund both my orders so I had to call back.  Outstanding customer service.

name: Chelsea E
text: Horrible customer service at the huntsville area!! My parents never received their arrangement after i placed the order well over two weeks ago! I was told by a staff member that it was on the way at 3pm and now (7pm) I've been on hold for the last twenty minutes trying to figure out where it is! after reading all of these reviews, im convinced there's a truck driver somewhere eating lots of delicious fruit and chocolate... Can I please just have a refund?

name: Ann West
text: Half of my daughters Birthday delivery (from her Military Sister )came apparently the chocolate dipped bananas weren’t ready and were supposed to be delivered before 4pm. They never delivered them and will not answer the phone ! I DO NOT APPRECIATE MY ARMY DAUGHTER THAT IS DEPLOYED AT THE MOMENT AND SENT HER SISTER A GIFT BEING CHARGED FOR ITEMS THAT WERE NOT DELIVERED! That’s theft !

name: David Carr
text: Ordered on 2 occasions, both orders incorrect. The cookies they sent this time looked like they had already been picked over by rats, and their phone is ALWAYS BUSY. same as last year. Never again.

name: Rose Marie
text: Excellent surprise and beautifully displayed!

name: M. Alexa
text:
My order was not delivered after the staff told me it would be. They ruined a surprise I planned for my son and his family. I called the store for a second time and they had closed. I am beyond disappointed and have left multiple messages asking for a refund.
Update: Eventually delivered the following day.

name: Jet Jones
text: The owner of this location is magnificent! He made sure my  Mother's Day order was correct, even with the high volume of orders,  wonderful customer service. Very polite, store very clean. 100% satisfied. Would definitely recommend this location.

name: Haley
text: I just ordered an early Mother’s Day edible arrangement two days ago. They called me when it was ready in case I wanted to pick it up early. When I got there, it looked great! They were extremely nice and gave me some ideas to keep the chocolate covered strawberries in good shape for my 15 min drive home in a hot car. I hadn’t even thought about that, so it was very nice for them to mention. I will be ordering from them again in the future.

name: Linda Bellamy
text: I usually call for special occasions for my husband. The arrangements are nicely done and it’s eaten within 3 days. Delivery is not always dependable, but the workers are courteous.

name: Collin Walker
text: Terrible customer service and my order was never delivered, they barely answer the phone and never reached out to me about my undelivered order.

name: B. Christine
text:
Update:  Feb 2, 2018

So after a year of not ordering an Edible Arrangement I decided to give them another try! This time I was blown away by the EXCELLENT service I received!!! The manager MARK is the epitome of a great manager with EXCELLENT customer service.  I had an arrangement scheduled to be delivered this morning 2/2/2018 to a business for an individual, but the individual decided not to go to work that day to my dismay. However, Mark said "No worries, we will send it out on Monday, don't let that upset you!"  He is such a great example of what managers should be!! I will support his store from here forward!

August 2016
I placed an order online fairly early in the day and the delivery was not made until very close to the time the recipient was getting off for the day. I was told it would be delivered between 1-3pm and I get a call a 330p stating it was just out for delivery! I don't understand why there is only 1 driver. The next time I'll just go pick it up myself to avoid such a terribly long delay in delivery!

name: Dana Edwards
text: Fruit was good but we did not receive all that we ordered. I paid over 100 dollars for a bouquet AND a box of chocolate dipped strawberries. Only the bouquet arrived. And they have not been answering their phone all day. Very disappointed.

name: Andrea “Dre” Mason
text: Terrible customer service when I called in to place an order on Valentine's day. The employee who answered was very unprofessional

name: Brian Moore (Armyballer)
text: Not a bad place, prices were a bit more than expected but I had no idea going in.  Fruit was amazing.

name: Austin Pifher
text: First arrangement was done ahead of schedule so I could pick up earlier in the day, fruit was fresh and delicious. Also I had a free voucher that had expired by a few days but the manager still honored it and had this arrangement done within the hour. Both positive experiences, definitely recommend this location!

name: Wabi Sabi
text:
The service and arrangement were great. I explained to the guy over the phone what i needed and he had the perfect "Get Well Soon" gift ready to go by the time i got there to pick it up.
[Full disclosure: I didn't give this location 5 stars because i was on hold for a bit longer than i cared to be.]

name: Elizabeth Vance
text: My daughter place an order for me of cover chocolate strawberries for Valentine’s Day pick up was 12:00 on the 14 got there at 12:30 the place was crazy and the people working didn’t know what was going on the order was not ready and said to come back because they were still working on orders for pick up at 9:30 really is 12:30 anyways came back at 4:00 pm waited another 30 minutes while there there was people in the back at least 10 doing nothing but talking one rude person in the front who had no customer service at all finally got my strawberries they were saggy and tasted old will not order go there or have anyone order there again

name: Susan Redwine
text: I received an arrangement of dark chocolate fruit on Sept 26, 2014. Everything was fresh and delicious!  And the balloon that came with the gift is still flying proud on Oct 15, 2014. I will use them every time I have to send a gift.  Fabulous!!!!

name: Linda Ridgeway
text: I HAD THE CHOCOLATE COVERED STRAWBERRIES TODAY AND THEY WERE THE BEST I EVER HAD! THANKS TO THE ENTIRE STAFF!

name: Jennifer Hodges
text: Highly pleased!  Walked in store wanting a quick edible arrangement made & a few other pieces for teacher appreciation gifts!  Service was made a with a smile in no time at all!!

name: Randolph Russell Jr.
text: Great customer service, product and location.  I'd recommend to everyone!

name: Jonathan Andrus
text:
Can I give zero stars? Poor delivery time, quality was poor, and to top it off items were missing from the arrangement. DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS LOCATION. $100 for a deflated balloon, sour strawberries, and missing items from the arrangement. A very disappointing Valentines.

Update: They refunded my money which was a pleasant surprise. I'm still not convinced I'd order from here again though.

name: William Brinkley (Ben)
text: They have very tasty and beautiful looking Arrangements. Pretty neat concept.

name: marquetta tatum
text: Mark, you are AWESOME! Thank you for your wonderful Customer Service! God bless you! :)

name: John Gray
text:
First, hand salute!!! The service was amazing, ordered same day delivery, took a look at fine print, and it clearly stated "delivery date and time not guaranteed, call store," so i called the store and was very impressed with service.

Second, the test...i ordered one from the university and whitesburg (neither knew), both same day, both same order, going to same address. Well, i am proud to say, make sure you order from whitesburg store. University did not have the same quality in fruit, even my 4 year old could tell, and some strawberries they shouldnt have used at all.

Thanks again Whitesburg store really enjoyed the arrangement and service.

name: Waldemar Ramirez
text: Bad experience. Made an order online to have it delivered on ST. Valentines day, did not happened. I called the store to ask about what happened, since I asked my wife about it and my wife said she did not received anything. So of course I am disappointed, I made the order , and hoping that while I was out of town, this would be delivered to her. No other details were offered to me, other than just " delivery was unsuccessful "... I know it was unsuccessful, duuhh!  So I asked for a complimentary delivery , the lady completely ignored my request and processed a refund. Which is ok, but you lost a client and possibly more than just me... I would not do no more business with edible arrangements , or at least with this store. Would not recommend you do any business with them.

name: Jessica White
text:
After ordering an arrangement for my mother and learning that she never received it on the intended date of delivery (Friday, Feb. 12), I called the store multiple times and was unable to reach them. After finally calling corporate I was told that the order would absolutely be ordered, likely by 9 PM (unacceptable in itself).
After it still went unreceived and I filed a formal complaint on Saturday, I was informed that they would likely be open that day due to the holiday weekend and my order would *probably* be delivered that day. Again, my delivery went unreceived.
Sunday, I called the store all day, always reaching a busy tone, but felt confident that the company would at the very LEAST deliver my order first thing that morning, despite it already being two days late. No such luck.
FINALLY today, three days after my intended delivery date, I was able to get ahold at someone at the store and let them know that I was displeased to say the least, and would like my order to still be delivered but would like the delivery fee refunded, as it did not arrive the day it should have. The person on the phone then said he cancelled my order completely (although I have yet to receive a refund), rang up another order, and charged my card AGAIN for the amount of the basket. By now, there has been $200+ worth of charges put on my card. But hey, they offered to give my mom a free box with 6 chocolate strawberries to make up for it.
After speaking with my mother, we decided to cancel the entire order and, YET AGAIN after not being able to get ahold of anyone at the store for several hours, I called corporate and asked to cancel my order and was informed not only did they have absolutely no record whatsoever of my 2nd purchase (even thought they were more than happy to charge my card earlier today), MY ORIGINAL ORDER HAD BEEN CANCELLED BY SOMEONE ON THE DAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE DELIVERED. I was informed that I should try to get in contact with someone at the store (as if it's so easy) and my complaints would be passed on to the manager. This experience was absolutely DEPLORABLE as far as customer service goes and I am extremely disappointed with the lack of effort to correct the situation.

name: Keith Richards
text: Super friendly and the driver was fantastic with delivering my wife's basket to work I was very pleased will be back for other occasions!!!! THUMBS UP

name: Vernon T. Mccants
text: Very very nice staff and made my 1st visit awesome. Make me want to buy everybody chocolate dipped strawberries.

name: Dawn Todd
text: Ordered on line to deliver on Dec 23..they never deliver the 90.00 arrangement when I called on Saturday they were closed...the customer service rep.. said iam sorry but there really nothing they can do other then refund the money...ok so they send us tons of offers via email and text ...but can not guarantee your order to be delivered...to me this is one of the worst stores there is they can not do the orders right ...will never order from them again ....as a retail manager...you want a happy customer they come back ...all I am reading on here is how poor service is this stores name...ordered Sherri berry's instead I know she will get it on time...

name: Sedohra Spears
text: This store is amazing and honor customer's birthdays.

name: Robert Smalley
text: Blown away with the delivery excuses.  Two days after the delivery date we get strawberries that are inedible

name: Francis Hughes
text: Wonderful, Friendly, pleasant atsmophere.

name: Kian vampire
text: Very Rude Employees

name: Southern Flavor 2 Seven Selma,Al
text: Wonderful

name: Bannhen's Southern Que BBQ
text: Horrible. Will never even Consider them again not even for 99.9% discount. Ruined my Anniversary/Valentine's Day 2017.

name: Jesus Navarro
text: I’ve been here a couple of times. The candy selection is great. The gelato is delicious! There’s also many decorations for the home available. Definitely recommend!

name: SincerlyTee
text: First, this place is so cute AND clean! So neatly decorated and upon entering the staff was friendly & helpful! Stopped in for a quick gift and found myself some chocolates! The quality of the taste is far better than anything you can buy on the shelf! I will be back!! 5 stars!!!

name: K. Miller
text: Delicious. Worth the drive from up North.

name: Ruperto G. Rosado
text: They have a wide selection of chocolates and other treats and the store is very clean and organized. The staff is very friendly as well. If you want something of quality, this is the place for you. 10/10 recommended!

name: Marcus Kirby
text: This place is the best for candy and gelato!

name: G Smith
text: I am no chocolate or candy aficionado, but I have sent this candy to  clients for over 20 years.  Everyone on my list looks forward to it and  they want nothing else!  This candy is a southern tradition in Alabama.  Everyone who walks in the door finds a home.

name: Kid Kid
text: Very high in calories lol staff is awesome so was the sweets

name: Diane Slesinski
text: Very pleasant all the time.

name: Vicky Brewer
text: I received a gift basket for Christmas it included the peppermint /chocolate toffee, English toffee, cheese sticks,, heavenly bits and angel bits   OMG it was all delicious.  If you are looking for a Christmas gift or any occasion gift you cannot go wrong with these candies.  'Thank you for providing a perfect  basket of mouth watering delights..  And a big Thank you to my gifter!!!!!

name: mtuscaloosa
text: We saw this candy store on Facebook and decided to stop in during a trip to the area. The ladies working are all super nice and very helpful. The candy is so good! Lots of gift ideas and my wife loved all the different things they stock besides candy.  Very much worth a visit!

resp.text: Thank you for stopping in!  We hope to see you again soon!

name: Nancy Steadmon
text: Great candy. They did over 30 baskets for me for Christmas.  They were perfect.  The candies are so good

name: Erica Bridwell
text: Best toffee I've ever had! Stopped by to get some for my mom, who loves the toffee too, for mothers day. Got a sample of pineapple gelato. So good!

name: Faith Nugent
text: Such a cool store! You can watch the ladies make the candy, you walk in and it smells like heaven! Tons of candy and gifts to choose from. I purchased gummies, fudge, and caramels and all were delicious!

name: Adrienne Ballard
text: Very disappointed in the staff. Not once could I get help from the 4 employees inside. My husbands birthday is tomorrow and I really wanted to make him a nice basket of treats. But when you walk in, don’t get greeted, don’t get asked if you need help (even after spending 10 minutes inside wondering around). But the two women who walked in before me got asked if they needed help by 3 different women and then the woman after me got asked. After spending $23 on a few pieces of chocolate sure do hope they taste good. Now I know not to waste my lunch break here.

resp.text:
Hi Adrienne,

I am so sorry that this was your experience! Thank you for your feedback. We will work to ensure that all feel welcome in the candy store. I hope your husband enjoyed the chocolate!

Morgan Price Candy Company

name: Venessa Leffers
text: Love having this store in Decatur! English Toffee and Macadamia Nut Toffee are wonderful!! Great place for teacher gifts.

name: Northern Hikes
text: Was unable to attend a special birthday for my niece who lives in Decatur. After a five minute conversation with a helpful  employee, my basket was selected and on it's way. I was blown away when  my niece tested me  two hours later to say thanks. I highly recommend this store.

name: TJ Brakefield
text: The ladies here make some really awesome treats. Out of everything I bought for my girlfriend on Valentine's I recommend the chocolate covered espresso beans above all else, providing you're into that sort of thing.

name: Sherry Nelson
text: Yummy. Need i say more. All kinds of delicious treats.

name: Cynthia Mote
text: Delicious candy!! Really nice employees!!

name: Tammy Hogan
text: Cute shop! English Toffee is so delicious!! Yum!! Will go again!

name: Jennifer Mills Griffis
text: Best sweet treats ever 😍

name: Bob Peters
text:
Bob Peters here,

Sweet Mother of all things sweet. This place makes me head bang! Every bit of candy I've had is a total screamer. I pick up 50lbs before every canoe trip I go on.

name: Donna Cooper
text: English Toffee is delicious!

name: Karaline
text: If you're not sure what to try, get a basic sea salt caramel. They are heavenly and melt in your mouth.

name: Jeremiah Comer
text: I ordered by phone for a Christmas delivery. Everything was good, but i requested a three tiered box and they received a single box. :/

name: Gary McClimans
text: Wonderful little store! Great service and wide selection.

name: Kimberly Gordon
text: I love this place ..Geloto is sinful 😍

name: Jerry Nobles
text: Excellent in every aspect! Service,quality,clenliness

name: Chandler Reynolds
text: It's pricey but delicious. If you're looking for a treat this is the place to find it!

name: Lisa Pendergrast
text: Amazing place. All i can say is TRUFFLES TRUFFLES TRUFFLES!!!!!

name: Leslie Maxwell
text: Yummy candies and cute merch as well

name: CJ
text: Great toffee

name: Teri Watson
text: Delicious!

name: Rodney Alexander
text: Best place in America to buy handmade candy!!!!!! Thanks Mrs Nancy

name: CJ
text: Great gifts holidays

name: Ray Long
text: Great candy

name: Steve Garner
text: Smells like chocolate and they make the goodies in front of you. Multiple viewer choice awards from The Decatur Daily.

name: Ann Gebhart
text: Wonderful

name: Presley Jenkins
text: I like candy.

name: Jimmy Ray Smith (JRay)
text: Best little chocolate place around

name: Robert Martin
text: Really great... little pricey...

name: Paul Spell
text: Good selection of special chocolates

name: Ryutaro Ozaki
text:
(Translated by Google) I was invited by a sweet smell.
I think that it is good for your use ~.

(Original)
あま〜い香りに誘われて。
お使い物にいいと思います〜。

name: Adrian Mines
text: I ordered my mother in law a dozen of doughnut rings ( green apple) with a bouquet of balloons ( mothers day)... well she received the rings which were left on the porch but no balloons.  When I called the manager she informed me they couldn't get any balloons out for 3 days or refund my money 😒.  I wanted my mother in law to have the balloons so she got them 3 days later. They were accompanied by a half dozen chocolate covered strawberries 🍓hence the 2 stars given. Customer service is EVERYTHING especially in these days.  I would do edible arrangements again but definitely at another location.

resp.text: Adrian, we apologize. Our mission is to always deliver the best possible customer service experience and we’re so sorry we fell short. We want to make this right. Please send us your order information at orderteam@edible.com.

name: Da Don Eric O
text: Very good Customer service. Very diligent at Expediting orders. Everytime I place a order it's just as I requested A1

resp.text: Hello, thanks so much for shouting out our team! We will be sure to pass this along to the store. We love our store owners and how they’re able to help everyone celebrate their special occasions! .

name: Angel Loveless
text: I ordered the Mother’s Day treat box and it did not come in the box shown when ordering, I received 4 cookies not 6 like it said it would have, then instead of 2 mini cheesecakes I got 1 and a brownie, the strawberries did not have the Mother’s Day chocolate piece on top like the description stated. Very unhappy, when a person orders something they expect it to be as shown and as the description states.

name: Chelevia Thompson
text: Perfect example of great customer service and friendly staff! Went out of their way to get my 12 yr daughter an arrangement!

name: Richard Munoz
text: Very helpful. Very kind. Mother's day win!

name: Vance Torres
text:
They lie. They told me they weren't taking order anymore at 2pm. That i could schedule an order for the next day.  The person I was getting them for went online and placed the order.  So now she thinks I lied to avoid getting it.
So if you call and they lie just place your order online. Customer service is garbage.

name: Latonya Finkley
text: One of the Best gifts to give a person for any occasion...Customer Service is always "awesome" and the fruits are always fresh.

name: Tracy Mills
text: I am not one to give reviews but this was one of the worst customer services experiences I've ever had.  I ordered this for an employee to be delivered on their work anniversary.  It is 2 days later and it was never delivered.  They said they attempted delivery and now it needs to be picked up in store.  I will never order from this location again.

name: Lisa Cunningham
text: Called and ask if they had pre-made arrangement, I picked up @hwood store, was beautiful and tasty♥️

name: Colby Lane
text: excellent gift shop, great collection.

name: overworkedcop
text: I made an order on line and the order went to another location by accident. The staff at this store went above and beyond to help me get my order in time for Valentines Day. They were super helpful and friendly. I would highly recommend this store!

name: Starry Jones
text: If I could  give zero stars I would  this location  was so unprofessional, the fruit was old and smelling. The manager admitted to the fruit being over ripe but wouldn't give me a refund nor send another arrangement and demanded pics like I was lying. They are too high to be sending out old fruit and bad customer service

name: Pastor Deon Howard
text: Placed an order for my wife that was delivered quickly, the presentation was awesome and the fruit was fresh and delicious. I have never had a bad experience with this company and will continue to support them.

name: Andy Marbutt
text: I made an order online and somehow it got sent to another location. The staff at this location went above and beyond to help me. They were super friendly and helpful.

name: Nicole Thomas
text: I ordered online Monday Feb 9th to have delivered to my husband's wk. Extremely easy online order & Exceptional delivery!! Fruit was fresh, ripe, & tasty. We're still enjoying the fruit 3 days later! A bit pricey with double delivery charge, but it was Valentine's. Busiest day of yr probably. I would recommend this to anyone.

name: Bernice Bunkley
text: Received  Chocolate covered  Strawberries. The strawberry was not sweet.

name: Kasey Bodine
text: I needed my delivery to meet a certain time frame and changed same day. I called and they made it happen within the hour! Very thankful for great customer service!

name: Linda Laughlin
text: I know it was Valentine’s Day, but wouldn’t even help me to deliver something that was very close to them

name: Purrito 38
text: Great workers nice and friendly and I love the smell

name: Shaprecious Mcgruder
text: I live in GA and I wanted to do something special for my Aunt's birthday in Bessemer. I placed my order online at 1:14pm swear to God I got a confirmation at 2:56 pm saying it had been delivered! I was in shock. I thought " oh maybe they did a crappy job" or " maybe the left out my additional items" NOPE! She loved it and the personal note. Thank Thank You!

name: Kyle Partridge
text: Set up a pick up for 10:30 and used my 30 minute break to go get it and bring it to my girlfriend for her birthday. Got here at 10:30 only to be told it wouldn't be ready for another 10 minutes and I wasn't the happiest but I understood and went to wait in my car. Sat in my car for another 20 minutes before I had to go back inside to check and see how much longer it was going to be. So not only was it not on time I am now late for work and I won't even get to bring it to her for her birthday while she is at work. Terrible customer service. If you schedule a time it should be done at the time not whenever it suits the workers.

name: Ben Tonner
text: Placed the order online and used a coupon. It was ready before the time I requested which was really nice. Overall very happy

name: Pam Braswell
text: So kind to me and I will be using them again in the future!

name: Michael Fagin
text: Great customer service on 7/19/2016.  In addition to my online pickup, I ordered a smoothie and it was made with fresh fruits.  Highly recommend this store!

name: Shedrick Flowers
text: Way over-hyped!! Save yourself some money and head to any supermarket to buy your own fruit and play around with arranging it. The presentation just wasn't all that great for the money.

name: King Williams
text: They don’t feel like doing it today but done it last time if people money not good can u just close are let s business that want to make money do it please ughhh y’all really suck the lady sound rude why say u Delivered if you don’t want to deliver.

name: jarvis Wright
text: Amazing service & food!

name: Chelsee Farwell
text: Worst customer service ever. I live out of state and for my sisters 16th birthday we wanted to do something special for her so we decided to have an edible arrangement with balloons delivered to her high school. 72$ later they didn't deliver the balloons and when I called to get a refund for the balloons a man named Bryant answered the phone. I really just would have been fine if they were apologetic towards the situation and cared but instead in a monotone voice the response I was given was "well sometimes we miss things, do you have the card so I can refund the money". Outstanding response sir. Needless to say I told them my fiancé would call them with the card information. When he called the owner answered and again was not very sympathetic to the situation. He decided a refund wouldn't matter since the surprise for her birthday was ruined anyways. She had the balloons delivered the next day that we paid for already and a box of 6 complementary strawberries sent with it. At the end of the day if someone in this business would have ACTED like they cared that their business took away from what should have been a special sweet 16th birthday delivery I wouldn't have such a bad taste in my mouth for this company.

name: Michele Coco
text: The customer service at this franchise is HORRIBLE. the manager, Rebecca, had a horrible attitude, as did the delivery driver,  and made what was supposed to be an awesome gift a pain to receive.  I almost called back to tell them to cancel the delivery entirely and to credit the person who sent me the gift.  I was not home for the initial delivery at noon on Wednesday. I was left a message on my cell phone by the delivery man to call the store to reschedule. I called, was placed on hold and then REbecca picked up giving me some stupid line of, "They are a very busy company and cannot schedule a delivery in  set period of time." I then proceeded to ask her if I was supposed to wait here all day to receive my bouquet. She said no, I could come pick it up. They would try to make sure the bouquet was at the store when I arrived. So, wait?  You can't get it to me in a 2 ot 4 hour time period and then you will try to have it there, all the way across town, should I happen to show up?  WHAT?  How is it that FedEx, UPS and even the USPS can deliver things nationwide but this little mom/pop business that serves the Birmingham metro (population 1.5million) cannot get it together to deliver a bouquet in a 2 to 4 hour time slot?  PATHETIC.

name: Lala M
text: Placed an online order. They called and stated they couldn't deliver until tomorrow. They have 5 hours before they close so why not? I originally tried to place an order earlier this morning and they couldn't deliver to the address I requested bc it was 2 miles outside of their delivery area. Ridiculous!!!

name: Remy Helu
text: Yeah anything edible is cool

name: Marcus Ellis
text: Love it

name: Gerry DAlessandro
text: Nothing edible insight.

name: Margaret Davis
text: The product was well received, but the employee was not wearing a mask. I asked about it and she said she had "health issues," then walked away and had someone else wait on me. That's the end of this store for me!

resp.text: Ma’am, I’m sorry you had a bad experience, but the woman who helped you at first has gone through things that you can’t possibly imagine, therefore she does not wear a mask. She even told you she has issues. That is why she got someone else to help you when you started acting like you were the mask police. I do not work there anymore, but I personally know the people that do. They are hardworking and try their hardest to please everyone and produce great arrangements. Before you go running to Google to post something bad, think about it from all sides first.

name: jay davis
text: Strawberries were old, browning, mushy, not fresh. Paid $60 for inferior quality. Wasn’t sweet tasted like water. Definitely asking for a refund.

name: Brent Black
text: Ordered 2 dozen strawberries over $100 for my daughter and wife’s valentines gift.  Confirmed pickup for 6pm at the store that closes at 7pm on Valentines Day.  Get to the store at 6:15 and the store is closed.  Go to the store the next day and not one apology but blame placed on me that it was my fault I wasn’t their at exactly 6:00 pm. Worst customer service I’ve ever dealt with.

name: James Hall
text: I ordered a mothers day arrangement over 100.00 and I asked to have a couple things chocolate  dipped, I was told NO. Even if I paid extra.  I placed my order 5 days before I needed it....so I had to cancel my entire order....they would not work with me at all

name: zachary courtney
text: Not really sure why it takes three hours to get 12 chocolate covered strawberries. Order has been placed since very early a.m. for pick up at 2 p.m. can’t understand why these are not being made until we have arrived and checked in. This place seems under and poorly staffed. As a first time costumer I’m am not impressed and from here on out I will most likely use Shari’s Berries.

name: carla sigler
text: The platter i received 1 do not look like the picture on site the cookies are not even cooked al the way and the cheese cake is nasty im not happy with this company right now

name: Ashley Green
text: Had placed an order as a surprise for my sister's birthday today. I had begun to get worried when nothing was delivered at 4pm, but the lady on the phone assured me it would be delivered once the driver got back. It is now 6:39 and not only has nothing been delivered, but they are now CLOSED. I am highly infuriated and had to ruin the surprise in attempts of figuring out what all is going on. I definitely will be requesting a full refund and cancellation, as well as making a call to corporate. As I had spent over 80 dollars to be inconvenienced, even though the order was placed ahead of time.

name: Prudence Knight
text: My strawberries were old and at first; they didn’t want to take my order over the phone because I sounded “black”, I heard them whispering in the background, and when they did, the presentation was horrible. They barely wanted to open the door for me because one of them said I was going to rob them. What a mess.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Delicious! They have a ready-to-eat case with single items and a menu to order from in-store. I was looking for something healthy but fun and got the donut, which is a cross-section of an apple dipped in chocolate with coconut on top. Young woman clerk in here was super patient, friendly and helpful. Pine Brook shopping center is a good substitute mall experience, sort of going up and down the sidewalk, and had never been in here.They have three ready-to-go larger arrangements in the refrigerated case. They have balloons and cards, and deliver for a fee. My companion got a chocolate-dipped piece of pineapple in the shape of a star on a stick. They also offer fruit parfaits in a cup @$5, and cones of fruit which are the best deal, and have a binder of other items you can order. The woman answered all of my questions and wasn't in a rush and not phased when chocolate fell on the floor. Fun contest with their photo cardboard cutout.

name: Tracey Quinsey
text: My gift chocolate covered strawberries were devine.

name: Leslie Phillips
text: I placed an online order at 9:00 AM and my friend received her arrangement by lunchtime (same day).  She absolutely LOVED it .  I was very happy with the product, the ease of ordering online, and the quick (same day) delivery.

name: Bearofkratos
text: Best to call ahead before coming and picking, but never had any problems with the choices already made.

name: cindy h
text: A bit pricey but sometimes it is the perfect gift in the summertime!

name: mark christianson
text: Fresh, clean giant sushi rolls. Bowls are nice too. Definitely going back

name: Wedia Billups
text: Awesome place to shop for beautiful fruit arrangements.

name: Carla Owens
text: I’m a frequent customer, amazing customer service, beautiful and fresh product! Never disappointed!

name: Roland Hayes
text:
READ THE REVIEWS-YOU WILL SEE I'M NOT THE ONLY ONE WITH THIS PROBLEM!
I placed my order on Wednesday, August 15, 2018 for an arrangement for my Brother and Sister-in-law who's daughter had died 25 years ago this week and I just wanted to send them something to let them know I was thinking about them.  I ask the representative when was the soonest they could deliver the arrangement?  She told me they could deliver it around 12 Noon on Thursday, August 16, 2018.  I told her that would be great and to please get it there as close to Noon as possible.  She said they would.  I called Edible Arrangements at 12:30pm to see if my order had been delivered. The lady told me it was on the table being finished.  I told her it was supposed to be delivered at Noon and asked her when would it be delivered.  She told me by 2pm.  Bottom line, they did not get the arrangement delivered until 4:45pm and where they had to deliver it to was less than 3 miles from the Edible Arrangements shop.  I called and spoke to the manager and she didn't care at all about the problem and said there was no way they could have gotten it there by Noon.  I ordered it the day before. They open at 8am and you can't fix, arrange and deliver an arrangement by Noon and it is less than 3 miles from your place of business?  Something is wrong with your Business Plan then.  I called and complained to corporate  and they said they would have the owner call me from the Mobile, Alabama location but, I have not received a call yet.  I spent over $100.00 and the business delivered it when they wanted to not, when I wanted them to.  If I don't hear from the owner this week, I'm sending it to my attorney. I know it's just a $100.00 but, it's about the principle of the matter.  This business did not do what they said they would do and they have not even offered an apology, much less a refund.  Well, I expect a call and if I don't get one, it will most certainly cost them more than$100.00.  I don't want to have to do this but, it's time people are held accountable for their actions and it starts now for Edible Arrangements in Mobile,  Alabama.

name: Phil Jones
text: I have never had any problems with any Edible Arrangements location except this one.  After waiting in line on Valentine's Day for almost TWO hours for an order I had placed online, I finally had to leave and get a different V Day present.  Nobody ever came outside to give updates or give reasons for anything. People who had previously ordered days before were coming out saying their order wasn't even done!  It was so disorganized and confusing, and NOBODY was coming out happy.   I would personally like my money back, but the only thing we got was management sending a letter a week later saying they were "sooooo sorry" (actual quote, which shows how "professional" they are).  They should have had a line for order pick-ups, and then a different line for people last minute ordering. Or they could have at least had someone come out and explain whatever the heck was going on inside the store. Very disappointed and I was definitely not the only one.

name: Bailey Whittington
text: I spoke with a Mr. Colten today who was perfect and gave me every bit of information i needed and more. His customer service skills are excellent. Highly recommended!!

resp.text: Bailey Whittington, we're so glad everything worked out for you! Would you like us to enter a compliment to the location on your behalf. If so, please e-mail us at orderteam@edible.com. We'd love to share this with that management team!

name: Angela Haynes
text:
Terrible customer service, ordered for Valentine's day, went to pick up at my arranged time, stood in line 2 hrs, still not ready. Won't order from this store
ever again. Will order from Shari's berries.They don't even deserve 1 star

name: Andrew Conant
text:
Called the day before my wife's birthday to get her some strawberries, pineapples, and bananas all covered in chocolate. For whatever reason they thought I said no bananas and add apples. I'm sure it was a misunderstanding of some sort. MAKE SURE YOU DOUBLE CHECK YOUR ORDER WHEN YOU ORDER OVER THE PHONE.
I contacted the store to tell then what happened and the last laughed and said "well the apples and pineapples are really good." That's not the point. My wife loves chocolate covered bananas and she didn't get any of them.
I called back and spoke with a man who said I could come back by and pick up the bananas, thus salvaging later purchases from me.

resp.text: Andrew Conant We’re very sorry we disappointed you. Please email us at orderteam@edible.com with your order details, and we will look into this farther for you.

name: Nikki Scairono
text: Keshawn was so sweet! Excellent customer service. He went above and beyond and his employer is lucky to have him!

name: eddieb247365
text: The arrangements are nice but a little pricey

name: Keon Davis
text: This store was not prepared for valentines day! This is by far the worst store ive been too!

name: Braxton Carrington
text: Horrible ! My order wasn’t delivered. I called to let them know and they hung up in my face ! Can’t make this stuff up!

name: Michael Vaughn
text: Had to take care of a client

name: Todd Phillips
text: Delicious!!

name: Trish Lewis
text: Fruit not ripe

name: Pam Ward
text: Great place!

name: Brandon Barnes
text: Terrible place Valentine’s Day order three days prior and when I arrived I was greeted to a long line and waited over 3hrs for my order we were never told the hold up or what was going on manager never came out and answered any customer questions poor and very under staff customer service was awful

name: Alexis Washington
text: Ordered and wanted something delivered paid over $200 to have it delivered today and was told over and over it was out for delivery but it was never delivered I’m very disappointed and will be looking to get my full refund back being that I never received my items at all but I already paid Smh never order anything from this place or place a delivery because you won’t get it at all 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

name: J Hennessy
text: They take forever to make deliveries

name: Lisa Marie Lyons
text: Ordered flowers for a graduation celebration. Wow! Beautiful, artistic, and eye catching. Delivered as requested. Thank you.

name: Miles Hudson
text: Great service with incredible flowers!

name: Luis Rosas
text: Beautiful Roses and decoration , very sweet lady , for a long time I’ve been trying to find a good florist every time I go see my girlfriend, and I think I finally found the one , my girlfriend love her roses and especially the chocolate they sell , I would give this 10 stars ⭐️... very satisfied with the product and will definitely will come again

name: Drew Harcrow
text: My wife uses them often for gifts and/or flowers. She loves the girls that work in there.

name: James Duvall
text: Beautiful arrangement, fair price. She really helped us out for my grandfather's funeral. Very satisfied.

name: Gary Braden
text: No thank you

name: Sean Mantler
text: Absolutely beautiful Christmas decorations and displays! Very friendly and attentive staff.

name: Elliott Varner
text:
So.... I was told by the owner of Tiger Lilly that he did his job and those flowers and exactly what I ordered. He then went on to tell me he went above and beyond by upgrading the vase and adding a bow. He then tells me that it isn't fair to him for me to bash him on social media. The post is on tiger Lilly's Facebook page under community comments. I am yet to see where I bashed him. Then he continues to inform me how you just cant make some people happy. Not one time did he offer any reparations, exchanges, refunds, discounts, or even an apology. So that's my experience with Slade Carden and Tiger Lilly.
When I pointed out that he had not apologized he offered a half hearted apology. I cancelled my other orders and will not do business here again.

name: Kyle Cochran
text: Tiger lily is the best  in town! They always exceed my expections! Make sure to call them for all your flower needs!

name: j play
text: Nice. Very accommodating
